00015 namespace {
00016   // Declare RL Glue variables.
00017   observation_t current_observation;
00018   reward_observation_terminal_t ro;

00020   const double STEP = 0.05;
00021   const int PUDDLES = 2;
00022   const double PUDDLERADIUS = 0.1;
00023   const int START_SET_DIM = 2;
00024   const int START_SET_SIZE = 50;
00025   const int STATE_DIM = 2;
00026 
00027   std::vector<std::vector<std::vector<double> > > P;
00028   std::vector<double> GOAL;
00029   std::vector<double> current_state;
00030   Random rng;
00031 }
00032 
00033 double dot(double *u, double *v) {
00034   return u[0] * v[0] + u[1] * v[1];
00035 }
00036 
00037 double distance(const std::vector<double> &state, int p)
00038 {
00039   double v[2];
00040   double w[2];
00041   double z[2];
00042   double d; 
00043 
00044   for(int i=0;i<STATE_DIM;i++){
00045     v[i] = P[p][1][i] - P[p][0][i];
00046     w[i] = state[i] - P[p][0][i];
00047   }
00048 
00049   double c1 = dot(w,v);
00050   if ( c1 <= 0 ) {
00051     d = 0.0; 
00052     for(int i=0;i<STATE_DIM;i++)
00053       d += (state[i] - P[p][0][i]) * (state[i] - P[p][0][i]);
00054     d = std::sqrt(d); 
00055     return d; 
00056   }
00057 
00058   double c2 = dot(v,v);
00059   if ( c2 <= c1 ) {
00060     d = 0.0; 
00061     for(int i=0;i<STATE_DIM;i++)
00062       d += (state[i] - P[p][1][i]) * (state[i] - P[p][1][i]);
00063     d = std::sqrt(d); 
00064     return d; 
00065   }
00066 
00067   double b = c1 / c2;
00068   d = 0.0;
00069   for(int i=0;i<STATE_DIM;i++) {
00070     z[i] =  P[p][0][i] + b * v[i];
00071     d += (state[i] - z[i]) * (state[i] - z[i]);
00072   }
00073   d = std::sqrt(d); 
00074   return d;
00075 }
00076 
00077 double getReward() {
00078   double r; 
00079   int p; 
00080   double d; 
00081 
00082   // standard penalty
00083   r = -1; 
00084 
00085   // puddle penalty
00086   for (p=0;p<PUDDLES;p++) {
00087     d = distance(current_state, p);
00088     if ( d < PUDDLERADIUS)
00089       r += - 400.0 * (PUDDLERADIUS - d); 
00090   }
00091 
00092   return r;
00093 }
00094 
00095 double apply(int a) {
00096   double noise = 0.0;
00097  
00098   // compute next state out of current state and action
00099   if (a==0)
00100     current_state[1] += STEP; // UP
00101   else if (a==1)
00102     current_state[1] -= STEP; // DOWN
00103   else if (a==2) 
00104     current_state[0] += STEP; // RIGHT
00105   else if (a==3)
00106     current_state[0] -= STEP; // LEFT
00107   else {
00108     printf("Invalid action %d %d \n", a, a);
00109     exit(1);
00110   }
00111 
00112   // add noise
00113   for(int i=0;i<STATE_DIM;i++){
00114     noise = rng.normal() * 0.01;
00115     current_state[i] += noise; 
00116     //printf("Noise: %5.3lf ", noise);
00117   }
00118  
00119   // bring state within bounds
00120   for(int i=0;i<STATE_DIM;i++){
00121     if (current_state[i]>1.0)
00122       current_state[i] = 1.0;
00123     else if (current_state[i]<0.0)
00124       current_state[i] = 0.0;
00125   }
00126  
00127   //printf("New state: (%5.3lf,%5.3lf) ", current_state[0], current_state[1]); 
00128 
00129 
00130   // prepare return values;
00131   return getReward();
00132 
00133  //printf("Reward: %8.6lf) ", ro.r); 
00134 }
00135 
00136 bool terminalp() {
00137   return fabs(GOAL[0]-current_state[0]) + fabs(GOAL[1]-current_state[1])
00138     < 0.1;
00139 }
00140 
00141 const char *env_init()
00142 {
00143   P.resize(PUDDLES,
00144            std::vector<std::vector<double> >(2, std::vector<double>(2)));
00145   GOAL.resize(STATE_DIM);
00146   current_state.resize(STATE_DIM);
00147 
00148   P[0][0][0] = 0.10; //puddle #1, point #1, x
00149   P[0][0][1] = 0.75; //puddle #1, point #1, y
00150   P[0][1][0] = 0.45; //puddle #1, point #2, x
00151   P[0][1][1] = 0.75; //puddle #1, point #2, y
00152   
00153   P[1][0][0] = 0.45; //puddle #2, point #1, x
00154   P[1][0][1] = 0.40; //puddle #2, point #1, y
00155   P[1][1][0] = 0.45; //puddle #2, point #2, x
00156   P[1][1][1] = 0.80; //puddle #2, point #2, y
00157            
00158   //-------------- RANDOM GOAL POS
00159 
00160   double d1=0.0, d2 = 0.0;
00161   while( d1 < PUDDLERADIUS || d2 < PUDDLERADIUS) {
00162     // GOAL[0] = rng.uniform();
00163     // GOAL[1] = rng.uniform();
00164     GOAL[0] = 1;
00165     GOAL[1] = 1;
00166     d1 = distance(GOAL, 0);
00167     d2 = distance(GOAL, 1);
00168   }
00169 
00170   // Handle RL Glue stuff.
00171   allocateRLStruct(&current_observation, 0, 2, 0);
00172   std::fill(current_observation.doubleArray,
00173             current_observation.doubleArray + current_observation.numDoubles,
00174             0);
00175   ro.observation = &current_observation;
00176   ro.terminal = 0;
00177   ro.reward = 0.0;      
00178 
00179   std::stringstream response;
00180   response << "VERSION RL-Glue-3.0 PROBLEMTYPE episodic DISCOUNTFACTOR 1 ";
00181   response << "OBSERVATIONS DOUBLES (" << STATE_DIM << " 0 1) ";
00182   response << "ACTIONS INTS (0 3) ";
00183   response << "REWARDS (" << -400.0 * PUDDLERADIUS * PUDDLES << " 0) ";
00184   response << "EXTRA PuddleWorld implemented by Nicholas K. Jong.";
00185   static std::string buffer;
00186   buffer = response.str();
00187   return buffer.c_str();
00188 }
00189 
00190 void env_cleanup()
00191 {
00192   clearRLStruct(&current_observation);
00193 
00194   current_state.clear();
00195   GOAL.clear();
00196   P.clear();
00197 }

00199 const observation_t *env_start()
00200 {
00201   int count = 0;
00202   current_state[0] = rng.uniform();
00203   current_state[1] = rng.uniform();
00204 
00205   while((fabs(current_state[0] - GOAL[0]) + fabs(current_state[1] - GOAL[1]) < 0.2) && count < 10000)
00206     {
00207       current_state[0] = rng.uniform();
00208       current_state[1] = rng.uniform();
00209       count++;
00210     }
00211 
00212   std::copy(current_state.begin(),
00213             current_state.end(),
00214             current_observation.doubleArray);
00215   ro.reward = 0.0;
00216   ro.terminal = 0;
00217 
00218   return &current_observation;
00219 }
00220 
00221 const reward_observation_terminal_t *env_step(const action_t *a)   
00222 {       
00223   ro.reward = apply(a->intArray[0]);
00224   ro.terminal = terminalp() ? 1 : 0;
00225 
00226   std::copy(current_state.begin(),
00227             current_state.end(),
00228             current_observation.doubleArray);
00229 
00230   return &ro;
00231 }   
00232 
00233 const char *env_message(const char *_inMessage) {
00234   std::stringstream response;
00235   std::stringstream message(_inMessage);
00236 
00237   // Tokenize the message
00238   std::istream_iterator<std::string> it(message);
00239   std::istream_iterator<std::string> end;
00240   
00241   while (it != end) {
00242     std::string command(*it++);
00243     if (command.compare("set-random-seed") == 0) {
00244       if (it == end) {
00245         response << "PuddleWorld received set-random-seed with no argument.\n";
00246       } else {
00247         std::string seed_string(*it++);
00248         int seed = atoi(seed_string.c_str());
00249         rng.reset(seed);
00250         response << "PuddleWorld set random seed to " << seed << ".\n";
00251       }
00252     } else {
00253       response << "PuddleWorld did not understand '" << command << "'.\n";
00254     }
00255   }
00256 
00257   static std::string buffer;
00258   buffer = response.str();
00259   return buffer.c_str();
00260 }
